summary: Celsius’ Alex Mashinsky pleads guilty to fraud, some Tornado Cash sanctions are overturned, and tech billionaires complain about “debanking”
title: Issue 71 – (Crypto) banks are not your friends

summary: Let’s say you’ve got some kind of service you want to connect to through Tailscale.  How do you make it accessible over your tailnet.  It's easy for decision paralysis to set in here, so let's consolidate some of the possibilities in one place
title: Four increasingly sophisticated ways to put a service on your tailnet

summary: Spatial Personas in Apple Vision Pro.  They look awesome, and everyone who tries them says they’re transformational.  But I don’t know anyone personally who has a Vision Pro to try it with...
title: A few Apple features that I was super excited for, but have yet to ever try

summary:
Each day, I set aside time do not nothing. 

It’s inefficient. 

During the workday, I may walk around the neighborhood, drive to get fro-yo, or simply sit in silence...
title: Successfully inefficient
